channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: NBA champion Celtics to visit White House, President Biden on Thursday
item.description: The Boston Celtics say they will make the traditional champions’ visit to the White House on Thursday, when they will be welcomed by President Joe Biden a day before their game in Washington against the Wizards.

item.title: Josh Allen’s 26-yard run seals Bills’ 30-21 win over KC and ends Chiefs’ bid for a perfect season
item.description: Josh Allen ran for a 26-yard touchdown on fourth down with 2:17 left, sealing the Buffalo Bills’ 30-21 win over the Kansas City Chiefs.

item.title: 3 hurt when small plane crashes near Southern California dragstrip hosting racing event
item.description: Authorities say three people were injured aboard a single-engine plane that crashed near a Southern California dragstrip where fans were gathered for the finals of a racing event.
